Title: Nestle is creating AI-powered 'digital twins'
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Nestlé is transforming content creation with their new AI-powered service, hosted on Microsoft Azure. By leveraging digital twins on NVIDIA Omniverse, Nestlé can now create high-quality product content at scale for eCommerce and digital media channels. Hear more about how Microsoft AI is transforming business for marketers from Nestlé CMO, Aude Gandon. Learn more about Microsoft solutions for consumer goods organizations: https://msft.it/6054SI09E

Stay up to date with the latest news and resources from Microsoft: https://msft.it/6055SI091

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud #GenerativeAI
